description: A simple substitution cipher for alphabetic writing that does not require a key
name: atbash
title: Atbash Cipher

description: Each character of the source text is encoded with a Caesar cipher using different keys
name: vigenere
title: Vigenere Cipher

description: It is a classic type of transposition cipher, got its second name from the way encryption is performed - a zigzag cipher
name: railFence
title: Rail Fence Cipher

description: The scytale is a tool used to implement permutation encryption, also known in cryptography as the cipher of Ancient Sparta.
name: scytale
title: Scytale Cipher

description: One of the simplest and most widely known encryption methods
name: caesar
title: Caesar Cipher

description: You can decipher the Morse code using a special alphabet. This tool is designed to simplify this process
name: morse
title: Morse code
